section.p: You see an old man wading ankle-deep in mud as he crosses from one tavern to another. His reason for not using the boardwalks is that dogs use them too - ‘The mud is more sanitary!’ he explains.

Regarding your enquiry about Smogmaw’s temples, he mentions four: ‘There is the shrine to Alvir and Valmir, the temple of the Three Fortunes, a shrine to Glimbinki the Plumed One, and somewhere there’s a fane sacred to Badogor.’
He puts his finger to his lips. ‘Sssh. The Unspoken One.’

choices.choice: Visit the temple of the Three Fortunes
Visit the shrine of Alvir and Valmir
